com.htsmart.wristband

类 WristbandApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.htsmart.wristband.WristbandApplication

  • public class WristbandApplication
extends Application
    Perform initialization work, and provide external access interface. You can directly make your own Application class inherit it, or initialize it in the onCreate method. 

     public class YourApplication extends WristbandApplication{
     ....
 }

 or

 public class YourApplication extends Application{
      public void onCreate() {
          super.onCreate();
          WristbandApplication.init(this);
      }
 }

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()

      • init

        public static void init(Application application)
        Perform initialization work
        参数:
        application - Your application object

      • setDebugEnable

        public static void setDebugEnable(boolean enable)
        Setting debug mode. This is related to whether output some important log information. Default is false.
        参数:
        enable - true is enable, false is disable

      • isDebugEnable

        public static boolean isDebugEnable()
        Is debug mode enable
        返回:
        true is enable, false is disable

      • setDeviceStatusEnable

        public static void setDeviceStatusEnable(boolean enable)
        Developers don't need care
        参数:
        enable - true is enable, false is disable

      • isDeviceStatusEnable

        public static boolean isDeviceStatusEnable()
        Developers don't need care
        返回:
        true is enable, false is disable

      • getDeviceScanner

        public static IDeviceScanner getDeviceScanner()
        Get IDeviceScanner. Be used for bluetooth scan operation
        返回:
        IDeviceScanner

      • getDeviceConnector

        public static IDeviceConnector getDeviceConnector()
        Get IDeviceConnector. Be used for bluetooth device connect/disconnect operation
        返回:
        IDeviceConnector

      • getDevicePerformer

        public static IDevicePerformer getDevicePerformer()
        Get IDevicePerformer. Be used for some wristband operation, like sync data, setting alarms, setting health monitor, setting display configuration, etc.
        返回:
        IDevicePerformer

      • getContext

        public static Context getContext()
        Get Context object. Actually it is a android.app.Application Context
        返回:
        Context
